clients.title: Do You Offer Onsite Services and/or Online Appointments?
description: Google My Business allows business owners to set various attributes to let customers know what the business has to offer. Some of these attributes may be displayed in the Local searches on Google. Due to COVID-19, Google added "Onsite services" and "Online appointments" as attributes so business owners can specify the kind of services they are providing during this time.
Keep your business information up to date on Google and let your clients know the service you offer!
